name: Nadeshiko's Dollhouse
summary:
What if you were never truly in control?

Play as Nadeshiko, a sweet doll who has been waiting to meet her new owner, Nicole. Explore your surroundings to learn more about the family and uncover lingering secrets of the past. It's no surprise that dolls have always been an item of comfort for children.

Now it's your turn to take on this role and fulfill your purpose.
